title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: What do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?If the previous days did not prove to you that altcoin are bad as a long or medium term investment, then there is nothing to prove that.Altcoins may be good for short-term speculation, but it is a high-risk investment.Invest in bitcoin until you have enough experience.

comments.author: AicecreaME
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?Go for big projects, because they are good for long-term investment such as ETH, ADA, BNB, SHIB, XRP, etc. You could search for more that suit your budget. Everything is in the dip right now so buying is a really good choice in my opinion. I just wanna remind you that trading in stock means you have a lot of patient to wait for the right time to sell for you to maximize your profits in the long run.

comments.author: martyns
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?There are lots of promising coins that will explore in the future. Gmt,Near,Ape,Ust and the most important Luna. The market is down and all these coins mentioned below are in a serious dip, they will still pumped back but it's just a matter of time. For me, the two top alt coins I'm going to bagged are GMT which was $4, has dump to 0.9 cents. This is the time to bagged more coins and hold your position. Luna is the worst of it all, for a coin that have surpassed $100 have dumped seriously to 0.02 cents and it's still dipping. These investments might been considered as long investments because these coins mentioned will not just get up and pump, rather it will take time before it go back to it's ATH value.

comments.author: sklopan
comments.body: To be honest, I would not advise looking at altcoins now... You can see for yourself that now the market has certainly surprised everyone.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: sklopan on May 12, 2022, 01:15:08 PMTo be honest, I would not advise looking at altcoins now... Although my advice may seem absurd, I would recommend investing $50 by buying a Luna coin, which is currently trading at $0.004. It is possible that you will lose this money completely, but if the UST problem is solved, then there is a high probability that you can get a profit of thousands of percent.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?If you don’t have experience and new in trading, then I would better say not to listen to any one’s suggestions.For a couple of days observe the market now.Now the market is red as hell, once it starts recovering, you can search for your dream alt coin to invest.Another great investment option for you can be investing in Bitcoins in the current price point.Bitcoins are now in the bearish phase, once it starts recovering it will might break the all time high price.Still this is a suggestion, now you are the one who needs to take your own decision with own money.Good luck OP for your trading venture.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Why invest if you're not willing to do the work and make the decisions yourself? If you're just going to ask around for what to buy then simply don't invest and spend your money for something else you're interested in instead.

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?I think the current situation of the market if you wanna really a secure and trustable coin for investment, I will personally suggest you to invest in BNB. It is one of the best and trusted coins in the cryptocurrency world and there is no doubt about its future. If you look at the chart of BNB it has touched 650+$ in 2021 and the current price is below 280$. After the bearish market, it will replace its price. If you are going to really invest just invest in it. You don't have to worry about the profit .

comments.author: |MINER|
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?why alt coin go for the Bitcoin. I think who are the real holders they don't miss this dip. Even then if wanna invest in altcoin then you should take the top coins for investment. it can be- BNB , Polygon (MATIC) , ETH , Lite-coin they are also in a great dip for making profit by investment.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on May 12, 2022, 03:16:49 PMQuote from: sklopan on May 12, 2022, 01:15:08 PMTo be honest, I would not advise looking at altcoins now... Although my advice may seem absurd, I would recommend investing $50 by buying a Luna coin, which is currently trading at $0.004. It is possible that you will lose this money completely, but if the UST problem is solved, then there is a high probability that you can get a profit of thousands of percent.That is not really a bad advice, investing a very low amount of money on this coin that has been crashing could be an opportunity and I have been thinking the same myself, now in the case nothing gets resolved then you only lose a minimal amount of money that you could afford to lose, but if things get resolved then the profits can be decent even with such a small investment, however this is an advanced move which I would not recommend to newbies as it is likely they will invest way more money than what they should.

comments.author: palle11
comments.created_time: May 12, 2022, 08:33:04 PMLast edit: May 12, 2022, 08:53:42 PM by palle11
comments.body: The most promising coin is bitcoin no doubt as the first so far but that doesn't mean it is the only because there are others too apart from etheruem. Investing in BNB is also a valuable project. Binance is partnering with twitter and that is going to solidify bnb more in the cryptocurrency business. Ripple though is not my best investment coin but for whatever reason it has stayed up there despite the challenge.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?If it's for the altcoins, I'll still go with Ethereum. Yeah, fees could be high sometimes but I think that despite of all the market situations, ETH is remaining to be a strong candidate on top of all altcoins. That's what I think and I wouldn't buy Luna and UST as they're attractive to buy because they could go nearly zero and could plummet for more. Just for the sake of my own money to be in a safe altcoin, that's what I'm going to choose and maybe if there's another one, it could be BNB.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?Seeing hiw the market coindition right now, I will prefer to choose only Ethereum and also BNB.I am not sure 100% that they are promising, but at least they are much better than others. Additionally we have seen how bloodbathing the altcoin market right now following BTC.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I would assume that the best one right now would be the one that could go up most with assurance given by the people. Like if you trust bitcoin, and you think that it will recover for sure, then it is the best one.I believe it is bitcoin but some believe it is also eth, and bnb, and some others. Look at the drops, the coins that do not have truly strong support will go down a lot more, like how bitcoin dropped a lot less than SOL for example, which means that people trust bitcoin more than they trust sol which is normal of course. So, whenever you invest, invest into a coin that is better than all others and trusted to go back up, just like bitcoin.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: |MINER| on May 12, 2022, 04:07:05 PMwhy alt coin go for the Bitcoin. I think who are the real holders they don't miss this dip. Even then if wanna invest in altcoin then you should take the top coins for investment. it can be- BNB , Polygon (MATIC) , ETH , Lite-coin they are also in a great dip for making profit by investment.Terra was once a top altcoin. I've read this argument when somebody has said that those people that have been telling about investing at the top altcoins, should think specifically. I'm hit by that argument because I'm also suggesting the top altcoins. But with confidence, if the market is like this, nothing beats buying bitcoin. Then next is ETH.

comments.author: DoublerHunter
comments.body: Quote from: Robert518 on May 12, 2022, 10:32:53 AMWhat do you think is the most promising coin right now for investment?^ An altcoins that has a good network and is already used by most people.ETH has a good network and that is a smart contract, BNB, SOLANA, and MATIC which is very hyped at this moment and will probably have a good opportunity in the future, and investing now is probably the best choice. But all of them did not have the feature of being fully decentralized the same as BTC which is I put a large amount of investing that the altcoins. Prior to my investment is BTC and the amount that I can afford is on altcoins because you will never know what will happen to them since they are not fully decentralized.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: Anything except meme tokens, tokens with non sense APY, All of tokens in the luna ecosystem, and luna token itself. Luna was the worst coin to invest right now. If you are investing on it and you will be loosing your money instantly. It's better to stick into the top 100 or 200 CMC. You need always to avoid to deal with any tokens that built in the luna ecosystem caused by the dev can dump their tokens to your ass. The worst blockchain ever i seen
